author: randy
msg: *) Several fixes for suexec wrapper. [Randy Terbush]
- Make wrapper work for files on NFS filesystem.
- Fix array overrun problem in clean_env().

author: fielding
msg: Removed extraneous blank line is description of mod_status chars.

author: fielding
msg: Fix warning by initializing to NULL.  Yeah, its redundant, but ...

author: fielding
msg: Logging of errors from the call_exec routine simply went nowhere,
since the logfile fd has been closed, so now we send them to stderr.
Submitted by: Harald T. Alvestrand  [closes PR#163]
Reviewed by: Roy Fielding, Marc Slemko, Dean Gaudet, Randy Terbush
